classScheduleInformation: Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the piano faculty.

sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
